tool_description: Optimizes content delivery network routing based on user location, server load, and network latency to minimize streaming delays and improve performance.

available_cdn_servers.description: List of available CDN server identifiers

current_server_load.description: Current load percentage for each CDN server (0-100)

optimization_priority.description: Optimization focus: latency, load_balance, or mixed

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Mismatched arrays: available_cdn_servers and current_server_load must have equal lengths
Invalid server load: Load values must be between 0 and 100
Empty server list: Provide at least one CDN server
usage: Provide user location, available CDN servers with their current loads, and optimization priority. The tool recommends the best CDN server for content delivery.

recommended_server.description: Identifier of the recommended CDN server

estimated_latency_ms.description: Estimated latency to recommended server in milliseconds
